publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2882 Colin Fox:Circus Banâ€”That the Parliament condemns the use of performing wild animals in circuses; notes with concern the arrival of the Bobby Roberts Circus in West Lothian complete with a selection of captive animals; calls on the owners and management of the circus to stop using captive animals in their circus and to retire all circus animals to animal sanctuaries immediately, and further calls on the Scottish Executive to ban the practice of allowing animal acts.
S2M-2882 Circus Ban (lodged on 26 May 2005) Christine Grahame*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2882 Circus Ban (lodged on 26 May 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-2882 Circus Ban (lodged on 26 May 2005) Shiona Baird*
S2M-2882 Circus Ban (lodged on 26 May 2005) Kate Maclean*
S2M-2882 Circus Ban (lodged on 26 May 2005) Mike Pringle*, Cathy Peattie*, Janis Hughes*
S2M-2882 Circus Ban (lodged on 26 May 2005) Mike Rumbles* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
